item.title: Getting started with oracle-apex
item.description: Apex.world # Register at apex.world today! apex.world is the center of everything APEX - jobs, tutorials, Twitter feeds, newsletters, plug-ins, and more! Oracle Learning Library # Oracle Learning Library gives you idea about how to use oracle apex in Real world. Site Built With Apex # Site Built With Apex which shows list of application built with Oracle application express. Hello World application # Steps to create “Hello, World!” application in Oracle Application Express:

item.title: Tabular Forms
item.description: Process a Tabular Form # When a tabular form is posted, the items in each record are available to PL/SQL code via the “APEX_APPLICATION.G_Fnn” arrays. G_F01 corresponds to the first editable column, G_F02 to the 2nd, and so on. For example, you can loop through each record and access the posted values for each field as follows: FOR i IN 1..APEX_APPLICATION.G_F01.COUNT LOOP htp.p('Column A row '||I||' has a value of '||APEX_APPLICATION.
